snippet: Greg Kelly made his first appearance on the morning television show he co-anchors since the accusation against him was first revealed.
abstract: Greg Kelly made his first appearance on the morning television show he co-anchors since the accusation against him was first revealed.
lead_paragraph: In his first television appearance since sexual assault accusations against him became public, Greg Kelly returned on Friday to the morning show on which he is an anchor and alluded to a decision this week by Manhattan prosecutors not to file rape charges against him.

headline.main: Kelly Returns to Show After Prosecutors Decline to File Rape Charges
